mainTask: Write an article about the benefits of meditation

subtasks.subtaskName: Research the scientific benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, etc.)
Research different types of meditation (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.) and their specific benefits
Research anecdotal evidence and personal experiences with meditation benefits
Create an outline for the article, including introduction, body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit), and conclusion
Write the introduction, explaining what meditation is and its potential benefits
Write body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit (e.g., stress reduction, improved sleep, increased self-awareness)
Write the conclusion, summarizing the key benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation
Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
